revision.comment: New page: First new account! W00t! But yeah, about me… I'm a complete geek. I spend all the time I can on my computer, write software for fun, am strongly opinionated about free and proprietary s...
revision.text:
First new account! W00t!
But yeah, about me… I'm a complete geek. I spend all the time I can on my computer, write software for fun, am strongly opinionated about free and proprietary software, I think that Windows completely sucks, I listen to bands no one has ever heard of, [[Wikipedia:User:Linus M.|I edit Wikipedia compulsively]], I run [[mediawikiwiki:MediaWiki|MediaWiki]] locally, I figured out how to delete MediaWiki accounts from the MySQL database, and told the Founder how to do this, I can quote Marvin the Paranoid Android verbatim, I was on the old version of RationalWiki, I created an account on the new version before the Main Page had even been modified, I designed the old logo, etc.
So yeah, I'm completely cool.

First new account! W00t!
But yeah, about me… I'm a complete geek. I spend all the time I can on my computer, write software for fun, am strongly opinionated about free and proprietary software, I think that Windows completely sucks, I listen to bands no one has ever heard of, [[Wikipedia:User:Linus M.|I edit Wikipedia compulsively]], I run [[mediawikiwiki:MediaWiki|MediaWiki]] locally, I figured out how to delete MediaWiki accounts from the MySQL database, and told the Founder how to do this, I can quote Marvin the Paranoid Android verbatim, I was on the old version of RationalWiki, I created an account on the new version before the Main Page had even been modified, I designed the old logo, etc.
So yeah, I'm completely cool.
Oh, I forgot. I'm also apparently a cybercriminal, who's being investigated by the FBI. So I've been told. However, I doubt this assessment's veracity (in case you were looking in horror at your monitor).

But yeah, about me… I'm a complete geek. I spend all the time I can on my computer, write software for fun, am strongly opinionated about free and proprietary software, I think that Windows completely sucks, I listen to bands no one has ever heard of, [[Wikipedia:User:Linus M.|I edit Wikipedia compulsively]], I run [[mediawikiwiki:MediaWiki|MediaWiki]] locally, I figured out how to delete MediaWiki accounts from the MySQL database, and told the Founder how to do this, I can quote Marvin the Paranoid Android verbatim, I was on the old version of RationalWiki, I created an account on the new version before the Main Page had even been modified, I designed the old logo, etc.
So yeah, I'm completely cool.
Oh, I forgot. I'm also apparently a cybercriminal, who's being investigated by the FBI. So I've been told. However, I doubt this assessment's veracity (in case you were looking in horror at your monitor).
And I'm both a [[wikipedia:Wikipedia:Bureaucrat|bureaucrat]] and [[wikipedia:Wikipedia:Sysop|sysop]] on Rationalwiki, and the semi-official tech guy, so if you have any questions, please feel free to ask me.

revision.comment: Update, it's no longer the "old" logo
